$eref.description:
This object contains information about the operation representation in AMQP.
See https://github.com/asyncapi/bindings/tree/master/amqp#operation-binding-object.
$eref.title: AMQP 0-9-1 Operation Binding Object

___bcc.description: Like cc but consumers will not receive this information. Applies to Publish.

___expiration.description: TTL (Time-To-Live) for the message. It MUST be greater than or equal to zero. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___timestamp.description: Whether the message should include a timestamp or not. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___replyTo.description: Name of the queue where the consumer should send the response. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___userId.description: Identifies the user who has sent the message. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, "latest" MUST be assumed. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___cc.description: The routing keys the message should be routed to at the time of publishing. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___ack.description: Whether the consumer should ack the message or not. Applies to Subscribe.

___deliveryMode.description: Delivery mode of the message. Its value MUST be either 1 (transient) or 2 (persistent). Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

___mandatory.description: Whether the message is mandatory or not. Applies to Publish.

___priority.description: A priority for the message. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

information about external documentation

allOf.description: Queue and exchange are mutually exclusive.

$eref.description:
This object contains information about the channel representation in AMQP.
See https://github.com/asyncapi/bindings/tree/master/amqp#channel-binding-object.
$eref.title: AMQP 0-9-1 Channel Binding Object

_88exchange.description: When `is`=`routingKey`, this object defines the exchange properties.

___name.description: The name of the exchange. It MUST NOT exceed 255 characters long.

___type.description: The type of the exchange. Can be either `topic`, `direct`, `fanout`, `default` or `headers`.

___autoDelete.description: Whether the exchange should be deleted when the last queue is unbound from it.

___durable.description: Whether the exchange should survive broker restarts or not.

_88queue.description: When `is`=`queue`, this object defines the queue properties.

___name.description: The name of the queue. It MUST NOT exceed 255 characters long.

___autoDelete.description: Whether the queue should be deleted when the last consumer unsubscribes.

___durable.description: Whether the queue should survive broker restarts or not.

___exclusive.description: Whether the queue should be used only by one connection or not.

___bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, "latest" MUST be assumed.

___is.description: Defines what type of channel is it. Can be either `queue` or `routingKey` (default).
